for l in range(1):
     plt.rc('font', size=14)

     fig1 = plt.figure(figsize=(15, 15), dpi = 80)


     plt.subplot(1, 2, 1)
     plt.plot(yg_array, ug400_array, 'ro', label = 'Ghia Re 400')
     plt.plot(yg_array, ug1000_array, 'gx', label = 'Ghia Re 1000')
     plt.plot(yg_array, ug5000_array, 'mo', label = 'Ghia Re 5000')
     plt.plot(yg_array, ug10000_array, 'bx', label = 'Ghia Re 10000')
     plt.plot(y_array, u400_data, 'r', label = 'Re 400')
     plt.plot(y_array, u1000_data, 'g', label = 'Re 1000')
     plt.plot(y_array, u5000_data, 'm', label = 'Re 5000')
     plt.plot(y_array, u10000_data, 'b', label = 'Re 10000')
     plt.plot(y_array, u15000_data, 'y', label = 'Re 15000')
     plt.title('u for various Re at K=1')
     plt.legend()

     plt.subplot(1, 2, 2)
     plt.plot(xg_array, vg400_array, 'ro', label = 'Ghia Re 400')
     plt.plot(xg_array, vg1000_array, 'gx', label = 'Ghia Re 1000')
     plt.plot(xg_array, vg5000_array, 'mo', label = 'Ghia Re 5000')
     plt.plot(xg_array, vg10000_array, 'bx', label = 'Ghia Re 10000')
     plt.plot(x_array, v400_data, 'r', label = 'Re 400')
     plt.plot(x_array, v1000_data, 'g', label = 'Re 1000')
     plt.plot(x_array, v5000_data, 'm', label = 'Re 5000')
     plt.plot(x_array, v10000_data, 'b', label = 'Re 10000')
     plt.plot(x_array, v15000_data, 'y', label = 'Re 15000')
     plt.title('v for various Re at K=1')
     plt.legend()
##     plt.show()
     plt.savefig('vplt_xplot,All Re K=1', transparent= False)
